content: **drops crocheted top with bare back in safran** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **sizes** extra small - small - medium - large corresponds to bra sizes 70 - 75 - 80 - 85 **materials** materials drops safran mouliné from garnstudio 100-150-150-150 g colour no 44 beige brown or use materials drops safran from garnstudio 100-150-150-150 g colour no 71 marzipan drops 3 mm us c crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge 2 drops mother-of-pearl buttons no 521
